_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The process of disillusionment and freed: Seeing the impermanence, suffering, and perishable nature of the six senses
Growing disillusioned with the six senses
Understanding that rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, and there is no return to any state of existence.
